p: Chloroquine has been proposed for COVID-19 treatment. This drug has been employed throughout the world for more than 70 years, being a component of the list of essential medicines of WHO. It is not expensive and has a well-established clinical safety profile. Chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine are nowadays employed against autoimmune disease and in the prophylaxis and treatment of malaria. These drugs also suppress the replication of some DNA and RNA viruses, such as SARS-CoV-1 [ 46].
